title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The enablement of the "Build" popup action is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled even if the build process is already done.
EB: The "Build" popup action should be disabled if the build process is already completed automatically.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Trigger the build process.
3. Wait for the build process to complete.
4. Observe the enablement of the "Build" popup action.
